      • StateSpaceLoop

        public StateSpaceLoop​(StateSpacePlantCoeffs<States,​Inputs,​Outputs> plantCoeffs,
                      StateSpaceControllerCoeffs<States,​Inputs,​Outputs> controllerCoeffs,
                      StateSpaceObserverCoeffs<States,​Inputs,​Outputs> observerCoeffs)
        A convenience constructor for constructing a state-space loop with the given plant, controller, and observer coefficients.
        Parameters:
        plantCoeffs - State-space plant coefficients.
        controllerCoeffs - State-space controller coefficients.
        observerCoeffs - State-space observer coefficients.

        public void reset()
        Zeroes reference r, controller output u, plant output y, and state estimate x-hat.

      • getError

        public Matrix<States,​N1> getError()
        Returns difference between reference r and x-hat.

      • correct

        public void correct​(Matrix<Outputs,​N1> y)
        Correct the state estimate x-hat using the measurements in y.
        Parameters:
        y - Measurement vector.

      • predict

        public void predict()
        Sets new controller output, projects model forward, and runs observer prediction.

        After calling this, the user should send the elements of u to the actuators.

      • setIndex

        public void setIndex​(int index)
        Sets the current controller to be "index". This can be used for gain scheduling.
        Parameters:
        index - The controller index.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the current controller index.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether this loop is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether the output of the loop is enabled.
